creator: jrw@pobox.com
text:
Most tasks (e.g. property) that use a classpath via can take references to path
objects, but whichresource only allows a classpath as a string.  Can be worked
around using pathconvert.

creator: peterreilly@apache.org
text:
<whichresouce> can take a nested classpath, this
can take a referernce. (no need to use a pathconvert)
I aggree however that the task should have a classpathref
attribute like other tasks that have classpaths.
